name: Wild Rice Pilaf With Cranberries
keywords: dried cranberries, wild rice, fall, side dish
recipeIngredient: 2 cups small fresh chanterelles or coarsely diced shiitake mushroom caps
2 cups small fresh chanterelles or coarsely diced shiitake mushroom caps
Salt and freshly ground black pepper
4 tablespoons butter or vegetable oil, or a mixture

recipeInstructions.text: In a heavy ovenproof casserole, heat the butter or oil. Add the celery and onion and saute over medium heat until tender. Stir in the mushrooms and cranberries and saute until softened.
Stir in the wild rice and the stock. Bring to a simmer and season with salt and pepper.
Put in the oven and bake one hour and 15 minutes. Remove from the oven and set aside, covered, for 15 minutes before serving.
